thread.section_title: MirrorMate Frames Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MirrorMate Frames | mirrormate.com
thread.title: Dave

author: Dave
title: Dave
text:
We recently purchased two exact frames for our two bathroom mirrors.
The frames came in with no problem and there was no problem in getting them installed.
I only wish we would have know of the buy one get the other half off because that is what they have been advertising for the last three weeks-
We have more mirrors we will do, but I will wait until they run this special again.
